name: K Sree Charan
title: Passionate Full Stack Developer & AI Enthusiast
summary: Dedicated software engineer with strong foundation in both frontend and backend development. Passionate about turning innovative ideas into reality through efficient, scalable code and cutting-edge AI solutions.
quote: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it's bad. - Cory House
bio: I'm a passionate full-stack developer who loves creating innovative solutions that make a real impact. With expertise in React, Python, and AI/ML, I've won multiple hackathons and built applications that solve real-world problems. I believe in continuous learning and pushing the boundaries of what's possible with technology.

soft_skills.description: Ability to break down complex problems into manageable solutions
Quick to master new technologies and adapt to changing requirements
Excellent communication and teamwork skills in cross-functional teams
Think outside the box to create unique and effective solutions
Natural ability to guide teams and mentor junior developers
Efficient at prioritizing tasks and meeting deadlines

hackathons.title: DevFest Jalandhar 2024
hackathons.description: Won DevFest Jalandhar, a tech conference hosted by Google Developer Groups Jalandhar, bringing developers together to learn and innovate. Judges were so impressed that they awarded us monetary rewards and goodies, including exclusive event T-shirts.
hackathons.challenge: 48 hours hackathon to build innovative solutions using Google technologies
hackathons.solution: Created an integrated platform that leveraged Google's tools for solving real-world problems
hackathons.learning: Gained deep insights into Google's development ecosystem and cloud technologies
highlights: Google Tools Integration: Built using Google's cutting-edge tools and technologies
Innovation Focus: Explored new ideas while using Google's development ecosystem
Collaborative Development: Connected with fellow developers in an inspiring environment
Event T-shirts & Goodies: Received exclusive event merchandise and rewards

hackathons.description: Arena Tech Challenge hackathon where we built innovative solutions and competed with talented developers from across the region. Focused on creating impactful technology solutions with modern development practices.

hackathons.solution: Developed a comprehensive platform with modern architecture and user-centric design
